jobInfo.postDescription:
Responsibilities：
As an Implementation Consultant you will be responsible for the following:
* Perform scoping workshops and production of associated scope documentation.
* Assist in customer server set up and configuration utilising the appropriate Cimteq by UL Solutions template installation database.
* Produce training material and perform training workshops.
* Provide technical input to customer ERP Integration discussions in conjunction with utilising the Cimteq by UL Solutions Standard API Integration solution.
* Assisting customers to implement the Cimteq by UL Solutions product suite.
* Completion of Implementation activities in line with the agreed timescales, deadlines, and business KPI’s.
* Adhering to best practices used within the Implementations team.
* Ticket management within the support team and responsible for meeting all customer SLA’s
* Day to day you will be a working member of the Implementation/support team which includes, scoping, training, and supporting customer implementations throughout the implementation period. You will also be resolving customer issues and problems in an agreed timeframe.
* You will have customer facing experience, interacting with customers as required.


Qualifications：
* Technical background with a good degree in IT, Engineering, Physics,
* Chemistry, Maths, or equivalent experience.
* Exposure to a high-pressure working environment.
* Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Ability to work closely and develop professional relationships with customers.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Enthusiasm, commitment, motivated self-starter, and team player.
* Take ownership of customer implementation issues reported and see problems through to resolution.
* Proven working experience in implementation of software solutions.
* Knowledge of the cable and wire industry (Desirable).
* Knowledge of software and application design and architecture.
* Knowledge of relational database principles and SQL language.
* Knowledge of Web based programming technologies, e.g. HTML, JavaScript, jQuery, XML.
* An understanding of programming techniques and practices.
* An understanding of electronic/electrical engineering (Desirable).
jobInfo.address: 广州黄埔区品尧电子产业园科学城南云二路8号

brandComInfo.introduce:
作为一家专业的应用安全科学公司，UL Solutions (NYSE：ULS) 助力遍布 110 多个国家/地区的客户应对安全、安防和可持续性挑战，并将之转变为机遇。UL Solutions 提供测试、检验、认证(TIC)，以及软件产品和咨询服务，以支持客户的产品创新和业务增长。UL 标志传递信任，也反映了我们对推进安全使命的坚定承诺。我们助力客户创新、推出新产品和服务、适应全球市场和复杂的供应链，并以可持续和负责任的方式走向未来。我们的科学助力您提升优势。 

UL Solutions进入中国四十多年来，持续为中国制造商提供方便、快速、卓越的本土化检测认证服务，助力中国产品进入北美乃至全球市场。目前我们在中国设有12个分支机构以及苏州绿色高科技测试运营中心、广州产品安全实验室、广州检测科技实验室、东莞物联网检测实验室、上海检测服务实验室、深圳检测服务实验室、常州动力电池检测实验室和中山燃气具实验室共8个大型实验室，以及众多获得UL 认可的第三方合作实验室和客户实验室，服务于超过22,000家客户，为中国企业的全球化高质量发展提供与时俱进的创新安全解决方案。  

UL Solutions 崇尚多元、平等与包容的价值观，持续提升员工福祉和敬业度，在2020-2024年荣获多项雇主品牌殊荣：2020年“人力资源管理杰出奖“，2021卓越培训创新应用奖、中国人才势能大奖、TOP HRM 杰出雇主奖， 2022卓越学习运营奖项，2022&2023年“HR Asia亚洲最佳雇主奖”及2023亚洲最佳雇主——多元平等和包容奖“……我们也将持续不断地为员工的成长和发展赋能，打造更卓越的员工体验，成为优秀人才的杰出雇主. 

 

加入UL Solutions，您将获得： 

1.五天八小时工作制，享受国家规定的加班补贴； 

2.具有竞争力的薪酬福利体系： 

年底双薪，年度绩效奖金，年度调薪等； 

按国家规定缴纳五险一金，公司补充商业保险、年度体检、心理健康咨询、节假日福利、法定年假+公司补充年假及12天全薪病假、员工旅游或公司团建、部分城市提供员工班车等 

3.超长假期：法定年假+公司提供的补充带薪年假及12天全薪病假； 

4.团队氛围：扁平化的组织，人性化的管理，员工之间互助合作； 

5.成长平台：业内技术大咖，一对一导师，丰富的线上线下培训课程，国际化的工作环境，多元与包容的文化氛围。  

 

微信搜索并关注“UL Solutions招聘”公众号，了解最新招聘信息及公司动态。  

Today’s Talent Driving Tomorrow’s Success.
